ai-sn29:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, dragons reproduce in these four ways.
ai-sn29:1.1.4_0: Dragons are born from eggs, from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn29:1.1.5_0: These are the four ways that dragons reproduce.”
ai-sn29:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, dragons reproduce in these four ways.
ai-sn29:2.1.4_0: Dragons are born from an egg, from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn29:2.1.5_0: Of these, dragons born from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously are better than those born from an egg.
ai-sn29:2.1.6_0: Dragons born from moisture or spontaneously are better than those born from an egg or from a womb.
ai-sn29:2.1.7_0: Dragons born spontaneously are better than those born from an egg, from a womb, or from moisture.
ai-sn29:2.1.8_0: These are the four ways that dragons reproduce.”
ai-sn29:3.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-sn29:3.1.2_0: Then a certain monk went to the Fortunate One,
ai-sn29:3.1.2_1: and after approaching he sat down on one side.
ai-sn29:3.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why some egg-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies?”
ai-sn29:3.2.2_0: ‘In the past we did both kinds of deeds by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn29:3.2.3_0: When the body broke up, after death, we were reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons.
ai-sn29:3.2.4_0: If we were today, when our body breaks up, after death, we would be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn29:3.2.5_0: Come, let us do good things by way of body, speech, and mind.’
ai-sn29:3.2.6_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why some egg-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies.”
ai-sn29:4.1.2_0: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha ... and asked him,
ai-sn29:4.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why some womb-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies?”
ai-sn29:4.1.5_0: “This is the cause, this is the reason why some womb-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies.”
ai-sn29:5.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why some womb-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies?”
ai-sn29:5.1.5_0: “This is the cause, this is the reason why some womb-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies.”
ai-sn29:6.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why some spontaneously-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies?”
ai-sn29:6.2.1_0: “It’s when someone is reborn spontaneously. They think:
ai-sn29:6.2.2_0: ‘In the past we did both kinds of deeds by body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn29:6.2.3_0: When the body broke up, after death, we were reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons.
ai-sn29:6.2.4_0: If we were to attack someone else with good body, speech, and mind, we would do good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-sn29:6.2.4_1: we’d better be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-sn29:6.2.5_0: Come, let us do good things by way of body, speech, and mind.’
ai-sn29:6.2.6_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why some spontaneously-born dragons keep the sabbath, having transformed their bodies.”
ai-sn29:6.2.7_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn29:7.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons?”
ai-sn29:7.2.3_0: ‘The egg-born dragons are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn29:7.2.5_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons!’
ai-sn29:7.2.6_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons.
ai-sn29:7.2.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons.”
ai-sn29:8.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the womb-born dragons?”
ai-sn29:8.1.5_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the womb-born dragons.”
ai-sn29:9.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the moisture-born dragons?”
ai-sn29:9.1.5_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the moisture-born dragons.”
ai-sn29:10.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons?”
ai-sn29:10.2.3_0: ‘The spontaneously-born dragons are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn29:10.2.5_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons!’
ai-sn29:10.2.6_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons.
ai-sn29:10.2.7_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons.”
ai-sn29:11-20.0.3_0: Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Region
ai-sn29:11-20.1.2_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons?”
ai-sn29:11-20.2.3_0: ‘The egg-born dragons are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn29:11-20.2.5_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons!’
ai-sn29:11-20.2.7_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons.
ai-sn29:11-20.2.8_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the underworld, hell.
ai-sn29:11-20.2.18_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons.
ai-sn29:11-20.2.19_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born dragons.”
ai-sn29:21-50.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the womb-born dragons ...
ai-sn29:21-50.2.3_0: ‘The spontaneously-born dragons are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn29:21-50.2.5_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons!’
ai-sn29:21-50.2.9_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons.
ai-sn29:21-50.2.10_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born dragons.”
ai-sn29:21-50.3.1_0: (The ten discourses of this series should be treated in the same way.)
ai-sn29:21-50.3.2_0: Thus forty-four grounds, for for forty-four kinds of search.
ai-sn29:21-50.3.3_0: Now, ten discourses occurred together with retinue
ai-sn29:21-50.3.4_0: The first sub-chapter on dragons is finished.
ai-sn29:21-50.4.1_0: you’re finest of pure and fine,
ai-sn29:21-50.4.3_0: When they’ve heard and the fourth,
ai-sn29:21-50.4.5_0: Having come down from the Pot, well born on alms,
ai-sn29:21-50.4.7_0: The Linked Discourses on dragons are complete.
